alwaysRequiresAuth.description: If true, then all routes will require the user to be signed in.

analyticsBucket.description: Bucket where object analytics data is stored

apiGatewayEndpoint.description: Endpoint to use for previews and other things. Should be auto-populated by your stack.

binaryApiGatewayEndpoint.description: Endpoint to use for thumbnails. Should be auto-populated by your stack.

calendlyLink.description: Calendly.com scheduling link (e.g. https://calendly.com/$username/$event) used for meeting scheduling popup aka Talk To Us.

oktaBaseUrl.description: Base URL for Okta Sign-In (e.g., https://$company.okta.com/oauth2 or https://$company.oktapreview.com/oauth2/default)

intercomAppId.description: Connects orange chat icon to our Intercom. If absent, icon does not show.

mode.description: App mode: MARKETING | OPEN | PRODUCT | LOCAL.

legacyPackagesRedirect.description: Requests to /package/$owner/[$package/] will be redirected there (must not end in slash).

linkedData.description: If present, expose structured data (JSON-LD) about the catalog and the datasets it contains

noDownload.description: If true, hide download buttons in the catalog.

noOverviewImages.description: If true, hide the image grid on the bucket overview page.

passwordAuth.description: Whether Quilt password authentication is enabled for sign in and sign up.

registryUrl.description: Registry your users will use to login and get credentials.

s3Proxy.description: Proxy server to use to get around S3 buckets with no CORS policies.

sentryDSN.description: Token used for logging to Sentry.

ssoAuth.description: Whether Single Sign-On authentication is enabled for sign in and sign up.

AuthMethodConfig.description: must work for actual values AND template substitution
